    Interface Description
    CustomClickCallbackLink
    Created by pmacdowell on 8/16/2016.
    CustomLongClickCallbackLink

    GenericRecyclerviewAdapter.MultipurposeRecyclerviewLink

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CustomClickListener
    This class serves as a click listener that can be implemented instead of just adding on the standard click listener.
    CustomLongClickListener
    This class serves as a long click listener that can be implemented instead of just adding on the standard long click listener.
